house_listing.house_description: Excellent starter home, great for investor, or someone downsizing, walk to the beach, near golf course, near bases, close to shopping & interstate, spare room could be used as a 3rd bedroom, cc asst. All appliances convey 'as is'.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Bungalow Style, Fenced, Storage Space
